text: navu yarige granthavannu nidiruvevo avaru, nimage ilisikodalagiruva sandesada kuritu santosa paduttare. Idara kelavu bhagagalannu tiraskarisuva kelavu pangadagalu ive. Heliri; nanagantu, nanu allahananne pujisabeku mattu avana jote yarannu palugolisabaradu endu adesisalagide. Nanu avana kadege amantrisuttene mattu nanu avanallige maralaliddene
